tossup_question: -   –  Three metals, A, B, and C, have reduction potentials of their +2 cations such that A has the greatest reduction potential and C has the least. Which of the following is true?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) A reduces B2+
X) A reduces B
Y) B2+ reduces C2+
Z) C reduces B2+
bonus_question: -   –  A student performs combustion analysis on a compound X containing carbon, hydrogen, and oxygen to determine its molecular formula. Given the molar mass is 76, if she combusts 1 mole of X in excess oxygen and observes 2 moles of CO2 gas and 2 moles of H2O gas as products, what is the molecular formula?
